profile.title: Fakamatala ʻa e ʻUisa (User Profile)
profile.mustLogin: ʻOku fiemaʻu ke ke hu (login) ke sio ki he ngaahi seti.
profile.autoTranslate: Liliu lea ʻo e ngaahi feʻau ʻotometiki
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Fakahā ʻi he taimi tatau: tukufakaholo mo e liliu
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Fakahā ʻa e tukufakaholo mo e liliu fakataha
profile.disappearingMessages: Ngāueʻaki e ngaahi feʻau ʻoku ngalo
profile.saveSuccess: Naʻe seivi ʻa e ngaahi seti!
profile.saveError: Hala: ʻikai lava ʻo seivi e ngaahi seti
profile.avatarSuccess: Naʻe tō lelei ʻa e ʻata!
profile.noPrivateKey: ʻIkai ha kiʻi ki (private key) ʻi he device ni ke ʻave atu.
profile.setBackupPassword: Fakakau ha faʻungamālie (password) ke fakapōpakí hoʻo backup:
profile.backupDownloaded: Naʻe ʻasi e backup kuo fakapōpaki.
profile.exportFailed: Hala ʻi he ʻave ki tuʻa (export) ʻa e kiʻi ki
profile.enterBackupPassword: Tomiʻi e faʻungamālie (password) ʻa e backup ni:
profile.importSuccess: Naʻe ʻave mai (import) ʻa e kiʻi ki fakataautaha ki he device ni.
profile.importFailed: Hala ʻi he import (password hala pē faila kuo faingataʻa).
profile.keysRotated: Naʻe fakatupu foʻou ʻa e ngaahi kiʻi ki pea naʻe ʻuluaki fakahū ʻa e ki fakakomipiuta.
profile.rotateFailed: Hala ʻi he liliu kiʻi ki (rotate).
profile.exportKey: ʻAve ki tuʻa ʻa e kiʻi ki fakataautaha
profile.importKey: ʻAve mai ʻa e backup kuo fakapōpaki
profile.rotateKeys: Liliu ʻa e ngaahi kiʻi ki
profile.keyDisclaimer: ʻOku ʻikai haʻatau ʻave hoʻo kiʻi ki fakataautaha mei he device ni. ʻAve atu ha kopi kuo fakapōpaki ke toe fakafoki ki ha device kehe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: ʻOku ʻi he Free — ngāueʻaki e Sun/Moon ʻi lalo. ʻUpgrade ke ʻai ha ngaahi sīmi (themes) lahi ange.
profile.backupTitle: Ngaahi Backup kuo fakapōpaki & Device Sync
profile.openBackupTools: Fakamāvae ʻe he ngaahi meʻangaue Backup
profile.backupDesc: Fai ha ngaahi backup kuo fakapōpaki ʻo e kiʻi ki, pea toe fakafoki ia ki ha device kehe ke fai ai ʻa e sync.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Fakapō tali e ngaahi feʻau ʻi he taimi kotoa
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Fakapō ʻilo pe ʻikai te ke fokotuʻu ʻi he app
profile.notifyOnCopy: Fakailoaʻi au kapau ʻoku kopi hoku feʻau
profile.loadFailed: Naʻe ʻikai lava ʻo load ʻa e fakamatala
profile.followHint: ʻE hā ʻa honau ngaahi tala ʻi hoʻo feed Kapau naʻa nau fili ʻa e ʻAudience ʻko e Followers (pē Public).
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: Naʻe hala ʻa e vahevahe ni
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Naʻe ʻi ai ha meʻa hala ʻi he vahevahe ni.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fakahū ha vili pe feʻau ʻoku ʻosi hu mai ki ho telefoni/koni ʻoku fakapapauʻi. ʻE lava ke fakahā ʻi he vili/outgoing feʻau ho nambara Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Fili ha feʻau pe chat room ke kamata ai
chat.emptySubtitle: ʻAve ha feʻau ke kamata ha talanoa.

status.captionLabel: Ko e hā ʻoku ke loto ki ai?
status.filesNote: Hake ki he 5 ngāue. ʻAho 24 pe ʻa e fakangata ʻikai liliu.

sidebar.errorLoading: Hala ʻi he tō ʻa e ngaahi chat
sidebar.loginPrompt: Hu (login) ke teuteu ho ngaahi seti.

premium.heading: Fai ha Premium
premium.description: Tatala e ngaahi meʻa ʻi he mālohi & toʻo ʻa e ngaahi fefonga (ads).

auth.headline: Fakamālohi, feauʻi ʻi māmani ʻaki e liliu vave
auth.description: Puipui ʻe he fakaʻikonomika, liliu ʻe he AI, feʻau ʻoku ngalo, mo e vili leʻo/visiō.
auth.desktopTip: ʻOku ʻi he desktop? Scan ʻaki ho telefoni ke maʻu ʻa e app.

headlineAlt.highlight: ʻoku lea pehe pē ʻe koe

auth.subhead: Feʻau fakapulipuli, fakaʻikonomika, pea kua liliu vave — ʻi he taimi tatau.
auth.tip: ʻE lava ke ke ngāueʻaki a Chatforia ʻi ha device kotoa — pe download ʻa e app ki ha poto lahi ange.
auth.scanHint: Scan ke download ʻa e app pe foki ʻi he pakeketi.

footer.doNotSell: ʻOuau ke ʻoua naʻa fakatau hoku ngaahi meʻa fakataautaha

home.title: ʻApi
home.subheader: ʻAve ha feʻau ke kamata ha talanoa.
home.welcomeMessage: Mālō e meʻa mai ki Chatforia

press.title: Press
press.contact: Ki he ngaahi kole mei he faiva fakahā, ʻimeili mai ki press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Ki he ngaahi kole mei he faiva fakahā, ʻimeili mai ki press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Ko Chatforia ko ha messenger maluʻi mo e liliu vave mo e E2E, teuteuʻi ke faingofua ʻaupito ʻa e talanoa fakalelue ʻi he māmani.
press.assetsText: Logo, screenshot, mo e fakanatula ʻo e ʻeiki meʻangaue (tau ʻasi ange).

careers.title: Ngaahi ngāue
careers.intro: Ko e timi siʻisiʻi ʻemautolu ʻoku langa ha messenger fakapulipuli mo honau fatongia ʻi māmani. Kapau ʻoku ke tokanga ki he fakaʻikonomika, fakaʻata, mo e UI/UX fakaofo, ʻe fiefia ʻemautolu ke fanongo atu.
careers.openRoles: Ngāue ʻoku ʻātea: ʻEnekinia (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Potungaue ʻOloa, Tokoni.
careers.apply: Fēfē ke kole: ʻImeili mai hoʻo CV/ngaahi link ki jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Fakaʻilongaʻi ʻa Chatforia
about.description: Ko Chatforia ko ha messenger fakapulipuli, fakalea kehekehe mo e fakaʻikonomika-toʻo-ki-he-toʻo, mo e liliu vave mo e vili leʻo/visiō. ʻEiki ʻemau taumuʻa: ke tokoniʻi e kakai ke fesoʻotaʻi — fakapulipuli, maluʻi, pea ʻi he ngaahi lea kehekehe.

values.access: Fakaaongaʻi ki he kotoa: Liliu ʻotometiki 100+ lea.
values.control: Pule: Feʻau ʻoku ngalo & read receipts ʻoku filifili pe.

about.howDescription: ʻOku fakaʻikonomika ʻa e feʻau ʻi ho device kae ʻoua ʻe ʻalu atu. ʻOku fokotuʻutuʻu e liliu, backup, mo e device sync ke fakasiʻisiʻi ʻa e meʻa ʻe lava ke sio ai ʻemau server.

advertise.title: Fefonga mo Chatforia
advertise.description: Atafakiʻi ha kau ngāue feʻau ʻoku nau kau loto ʻi he ngaahi fefonga ʻoku fakaʻapaʻapaʻi. ʻOku mau ʻoatu ha ngaahi banner ʻi he feituʻu ʻoku sio lelei ki ai, ngaahi sponosā, mo e ngaahi promo ʻa e fale. ʻOku ʻikai sio ʻa e kau Premium ki he fefonga.

adsense.withPubId: ʻOku mau ngāueʻaki he taimi ni ʻa e Google AdSense. Kapau ʻoku ke kole target ʻi he Google Ads, ngāueʻaki ʻa e publisher ID {{pubId}} pea kole ha managed placement ki he ngaahi unit ʻi lalo. ʻOku maʻu foki ʻa e sponosā ʻi he tokoni tuʻusa — ngāueʻaki ʻa e fōmū.
adsense.noPubId: ʻOku mau ngāueʻaki he taimi ni ʻa e Google AdSense. ʻOku maʻu foki ʻa e sponosā tuʻusa — ngāueʻaki ʻa e fōmū ʻi lalo.

advertise.noPlacements: ʻOku ʻikai teuteu ha ngaahi feituʻu. Fakaopoopo ʻi he ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Fakafiemālie ʻa e ngaahi sesōne ʻi he chat UI
why.brandSafe: Ngaahi fōmū ʻoku malu ki he founga ʻo e fefonga; taime ʻikai lahi
why.sponsoredMoments: Ngaahi moment sponosā (hange ko e “Kamata ha Chat” modal) ʻoku maʻu
why.deals: Feʻunga tuʻusa pe ʻaki e AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Mālō! ʻOku ʻalu ʻeni ʻa ho kole. ʻE ʻosi ʻemau fetuʻutaki.
form.missingRequired: Fakamolemole, fakafonu e hingoa, ʻimeili, mo e message.
form.mailtoInfo: ʻOku tatala hoʻomou ʻimeili client ke ʻave ʻa e kole…
form.messagePlaceholder: Targeting, ʻaho, KPI, ngaahi feituʻu ʻe ke fie maʻu…

legal.disclaimerStart: ʻI he ʻave ʻa e fōmū, ʻoku ke loto ki heʻemau

upgrade.title: ʻUpgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Fili ʻa e fuofua ʻoku totonu kiate koe: toʻo fefonga ʻaki a Plus, pe maʻu ʻa e ngaahi malohi kotoa ʻaki a Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Te ke tuʻuta ʻaki ʻa e sipsikuli
scheduleBanner.body: Te ke toe foki ki he Free ʻi he

free.title: Free
free.ctaCurrent: Fuofua ʻoku ʻi ai he taimi ni

features.priorityUpdates: Hoko ʻi muʻa ʻa e ngaahi fakalakalaka

features.sameFeatures: Ngaahi meʻa tatau mo e Māhina

gettingStarted.title: Kamata Vave
gettingStarted.subtitle: Foʻou ki Chatforia? Ko ʻeni ha taʻiala vave ke ke ngāueʻaki ʻi he miniti ʻe niʻihi.

alert.text: Te u fakalahi ʻa e taʻiala ni ʻi he taimi ʻoku ʻalu ai ʻa e ngaahi features foʻou. Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ha meʻa ʻoku hala, tala mai ʻaki e

section1.title: 1) Fai ho ʻakauni
section1.loginText: ʻaki ho ʻakauni ʻoku ʻi ai.

section2.title: 2) Kamata talanoa
section2.item1: Fai ha DM pe Kulupu pea ʻave ho feʻau muamua.
section2.item2: Ngaueʻaki e liliu vave ke talanoa ʻi he 100+ lea.
section2.item3: Sio ki he feʻau ʻoku ngalo mo e read receipts ʻi he Fakamatala → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) ʻAlu ki muʻa
section3.item1Part2: peesi (Plus = ʻikai fefonga, Premium = ngaahi meʻa kotoa).
section3.item2Part1: Fesoʻotaʻi ha ngaahi device lahi ange pea fokotuʻu ha backup ʻoku fakapōpaki ʻi he

account.q: Fēfē ke fai pe toe maʻu hoku ʻakauni?
account.a: Download ʻa e app pe ngāueʻaki ʻa e web, lomi ʻi “Create account”, fakapapauʻi ho ʻimeili/telefoni. Ke toe maʻu, ngāueʻaki “Forgot password”.

privacy.q: ʻOku fakaʻikonomika-toʻo-ki-he-toʻo ʻa e ngaahi feʻau?
privacy.a: ʻIo. ʻOku E2E ʻa e ngaahi feʻau mo e ngaahi vili ʻi he kamata. Ko koe pē mo e tali ʻe lava ʻo lau ia.

translate.a: Fakamālohiʻi e “Auto-translate” ʻi he Settings → Appearance & Language. ʻOku fai ʻi he device ʻoku lava ai; kapau ʻikai, ʻoku ʻasi ʻaki ha API maluʻi mo e metadata siʻisiʻi.

contact.a: ʻImeili mai ki support@chatforia.com. Fakakau ha screenshot mo ho app version.

contact.title: Fetuʻutaki Mai
contact.successMsg: Mālō — te mau tali ʻaki ha ʻimeili.
contact.errorSend: ʻIkai lava ʻo ʻave. Fakamolemole ʻimeili mai ki support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: ʻOku fakaʻamatale ʻe he Polokalama ni pe fēfē ʻe Chatforia (“mau”, “kimautolu”) ʻoku mau toloi, ngāueʻaki, mo fakavahevaheʻi e fakamatala ʻi he taimi ʻoku ke ngāueʻaki ai ʻa e ʻemau ngaahi polokalama mo ngāue. ʻOku mau fokotuʻutuʻu ʻa Chatforia ke fakasiʻisiʻi ʻa e fakamatala ʻe lava ke ʻasi kiate kimautolu.

infoWeCollect.title: Fakamatala ʻoku mau toloi
infoWeCollect.account: Fakamatala ʻakauni (hange ko e ʻimeili/telefoni) ke fai mo maluʻi ho ʻakauni.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Fakamatala kuo fakaʻikonomika (feʻau/vili) ʻoku E2E; ʻikai ke mau lava ʻo lau.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Fakamatala ʻiloʻilo/hoko hange ko e crash logs, faʻahinga device, pe ngaahi ʻanalaisi siʻisiʻi ke fakaleleiʻi ʻa e ngāue.

howWeUse.title: Fēfē ʻemau ngāueʻaki e fakamatala
howWeUse.provide: Fakaʻaongaʻi mo maluʻi e ngāue (auth, sio ki he spam/abuse).
howWeUse.improve: Fakaleleiʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa (lelei ʻo e liliu, fakapapauʻi e ngāue).
howWeUse.legal: Fetuʻutaki mo e ngaahi fatongia fakalao.

sharing.title: Fakavahevaheʻi
sharing.body: ʻOku ʻikai ke mau fakatau e fakamatala fakataautaha. Te u lava ʻo vahevaheʻi ha fakamatala siʻisiʻi mo e kau ngāue (hange ko e ʻū meili push, ʻanalaisi) ʻi he ngaahi feʻau mahuʻinga.

rights.title: Hoʻo totonu
rights.body: Fakakau ʻi ho feituʻu (hange ko e GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ʻe lava ke ke kole ke sio, fakaleleiʻi, toʻo, pe ʻoua ʻe ngāueʻaki ha ngaahi fakamatala. Fetuʻutaki: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Tauhi fakamatala & maluʻi
retention.body: ʻOku mau tauhi pē ʻa e meʻa ʻoku fiemaʻu ke fai ʻaki e ngāue, pea ʻoku mau ngāueʻaki ʻa e maluʻi ʻoku moʻoni. ʻOku ʻikai lava ʻe kimautolu ʻo tatala ʻa e feʻau E2E.

children.title: Fānau
children.body: ʻOku ʻikai fokotuʻutuʻu ʻa Chatforia ki he fānau ʻi lalo ʻi he taʻu 13 (pe ʻe fie maʻu ʻe ho lao).

changes.title: Liliu
changes.body: Te mau fakahā ʻa e ngaahi fakalakalaka heni pea fakaleleiʻi ʻa e ʻaho “Fakamuimui”.

intro.body: ʻI he ngāueʻaki ʻa Chatforia ʻoku ke loto ki he ngaahi Tuʻutuʻuni ni. Kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke ke loto, ʻoua te ke ngāueʻaki e ngāue.

accounts.title: Ngaahi ʻakauni
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Tukuatu ha fakamatala moʻoni pea tauhi ho ngaahi password.
accounts.itemResponsibility: ʻOku ke fai fatongia ki he ngāue kotoa ʻi ho ʻakauni.

acceptableUse.title: Founga fakafiemālie ʻo e ngāue
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: ʻOuau ha fakangatangata: ʻikai tali e meʻa hala, fakalilifu, pe maumau; ʻoua ʻe spam pe ngāue ʻotometiki.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Te mau lava ʻo taʻeʻaongaʻi/taʻofi kapau ʻoku maumau.

yourContent.title: Hoʻo ngaahi meʻa
yourContent.body: ʻOku kei ʻa koe e totonu ki ho ngaahi meʻa. ʻOku ke loto ke ʻomai ha totonu ʻoku fiemaʻu ke fai ʻaki e ngāue (hange ko e feʻaveʻaki, tauhi, liliu).

disclaimer.title: Fakaha & fatongia
disclaimer.body: ʻOku ʻave ʻa e ngāue ʻi he “ʻotua” taumuʻa ʻikai ha fakatonutonu. ʻI he tuʻunga lahi taha ʻoku ngofua ʻe he lao, ʻoku ʻikai ke fai fatongia ʻa Chatforia ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko ʻikai ʻo fakdirect.

changes.title: Liliu
changes.body: Te mau fakaleleiʻi ʻa e ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni; kapau ʻoku ke hokohoko atu ke ngāueʻaki, ʻoku hā ai ho tali.

doNotSell.title: ʻOuau ke ʻoua naʻa fakatau pe fakavahevahe hoku fakamatala
doNotSell.body: ʻOku ʻikai ke fakatau ʻe Chatforia ha fakamatala fakataautaha. Ka ʻe lava ke fai ha kole ʻi he CPRA ʻe he kau nofo Kālēfornia ʻaki e kiʻi pātani ʻi lalo.

cookies.title: Seti Kuki
cookies.body: ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻe Chatforia ha ngaahi kuki siʻisiʻi (hange ko e sesoni, maluʻi). ʻOku ʻikai ngāueʻaki e kuki ʻa e fefonga ʻe he kulupu ke tolu. Fai seti ʻi he browser.
